options.description: The users that will participate in the channel. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: binaryProperties
options.description: Name of the property that holds the binary data. Multiple can be defined separated by comma.

options.name: direct_mentions
options.description: The users that are directly mentioned. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: mark_thread_position
options.description: Whether the position of the thread is marked

options.name: recipients
options.description: The users that will attached to the comment. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: temp_id
options.description: The temporary ID of the comment

options.name: send_as_integration
options.description: Whether to display the integration as the comment creator

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: filters
properties.description: Whether only the IDs of the comments are returned

options.name: as_ids
options.description: Whether only the IDs of the comments are returned

options.name: to_obj_index
options.description: Limit comments ending at the specified object index

options.name: newer_than_ts
options.description: Limits comments to those newer when the specified Unix time

options.name: older_than_ts
options.description: Limits comments to those older than the specified Unix time

options.name: order_by
options.description: The order of the comments returned - one of DESC or ASC

options.name: from_obj_index
options.description: Limit comments starting at the specified object index

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
